Title: [Updated] Drilling Engineering and Technical Services Market Size Analysis | Jereh Oilfield Services Group, ZPEC ... - economica.ma

Title: Selling Continues for Natural Gas Futures; California Cash Down Sharply Despite Heat â€” MidDay Market Snapshot - Natural Gas Intelligence
Summary: Natural gas futures experienced a decline for the sixth consecutive session due to cooler weather forecasts and weaker cash prices. Despite ongoing heat in California, August natural gas futures fell by 3.9 cents to $2.439/MMBtu. A federal court ruling to lift the LNG permit pause by the U.S. Department of Energy provided some support to the back of the curve. The report highlights the volatility in natural gas futures influenced by weather changes and regulatory actions.

Title: US natural gas prices fall - Markets - Business Recorder
Summary: U.S. natural gas futures fell about 3% to a one-month low due to rising output, reduced demand forecasts, and oversupply in storage. Despite a heatwave increasing gas consumption for air conditioning, front-month gas futures for August delivery dropped by 2.5%. Speculators also reduced their net long positions for the first time in three weeks. The Electric Reliability Council of Texas (ERCOT) indicated a potential record-breaking demand due to high temperatures, although previous records were not surpassed.
